title: :everfrostFaction:

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pile snow outside someone's house at night, stopping them from getting any notifications.
- **Whiteout** - Prevent all non-Everfrost members from getting feedback tonight, then Coldsnap. Only usable from N3 onwards.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are alive, the Everfrost become falling snow, making all their visits astral.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the DSF, the DSF becomes falling snow.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Everfrost.

desc:
Post 4922
*2 emojis down, many more to go*
